articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Vinchin Backup and Recovery. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.

This new capability can improve your training cost by running different parts of the model training on the most suitable instance type. For example, we recently trained a ResNet-50 computer vision model on a… Read More »Announcing Heterogeneous Clusters for Amazon SageMaker model training

Cybersecurity researchers are drawing attention to an ongoing wave of attacks linked to a threat cluster tracked as Raspberry Robin that’s behind a Windows malware with worm-like capabilities.  Describing it as a “persistent” and “spreading” threat, Cybereason said it observed a number of victims in Europe. The infections involve a worm that propagates over removable USB devices… Read More »Researchers Warn of Raspberry Robin’s Worm Targeting Windows Users

articles.title: Researchers Warn of Raspberry Robin’s Worm Targeting Windows Users
